Articles.Content: hi i'm new for the forum but a veteran's kerbal player (only for the hours spend play with it not for the result of mission...thank's to scott manley for teaching me something whit his videos!!!!)
Welcome! That's really all I can say. I hope you will enjoy your time on the forums as much as I have. (LURKING FTW!)
Welcome to the forums! Hope your time among the community proves to be as enjoyable as that spent playing.
I find that I have more fun on the forum than I do playing KSP: There's a whole world out there, and it's chock full of KSP players.
